Trade/Device Name(s): Verigene Enteric Pathogens Nucleic Acid Test (EP)
Regulation Name(s): Gastrointestinal microorganism multiplex nucleic acid-based assay
Analyte(s): Campylobacter Group (C. coli, C. jejuni, C. lari)
Shigella species (S. dysenteriae, S. boydii, S. sonnei, S. flexneri)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Verigene Enteric Pathogens Nucleic Acid Test (EP), a multiplex RT-PCR and microarray assay for simultaneous detection of enteric bacteria, viruses, and genetic virulence markers from stool in Cary-Blair medium.
Indications for Use Summary: Multiplex, qualitative detection and identification of common pathogenic enteric bacteria, viruses, and genetic virulence markers from liquid or soft stool preserved in Cary-Blair medium for individuals with gastrointestinal infection symptoms; performed on Verigene System; aids diagnosis and outbreak detection.
